```{r 5.1}
library(rethinking)
data("WaffleDivorce")
d <- WaffleDivorce

d$MedianAgeMarriage.s <- scale(d$MedianAgeMarriage) # standize data

m5.1 <- map(
  alist(
    Divorce ~ dnorm(mu,sigma),
    mu <- a+bA*MedianAgeMarriage.s,
    a ~dnorm(10,10),
    bA~dnorm(0,1),
    sigma~dunif(0,10)
  ), data = d
)
```

```{r 5.2}
MAM.seq <- seq(from=-3,to=3.5,length.out = 30)
mu <- link(m5.1,data = data.frame(MedianAgeMarriage.s=MAM.seq))
mu.PI <- apply(mu,2,PI)

plot(Divorce~MedianAgeMarriage.s,data=d,col=rangi2)
abline(m5.1)
shade(mu.PI,MAM.seq)
```
